Portal 2 is the best puzzle game I've ever played. I just love the setting of the story so much! Being in a destroyed underground science facility is a very original and enjoyable addition to the portal games. I still love Portal 1, but it just doesn't have the same sort of atmosphere that Portal 2 has. Portal 1 is too perfect. Portal 2 is just right!

It's Valve, they make good games, and this is no exception. Portal 2 is well known, so this review is completely unneeded, but if you haven't played this and like puzzles, play it.

Mas que recomendado.

Portal 2 is a great experience. Fun singleplayer campaign, though lacking the eerie emptiness of the original. This is made up by stellar writing and voice acting by the cast however. Co-Op is a lot of fun as well, granted you have a good buddy to play it with.

This game has always been very important to me and always holds a very special place in my heart; I basically grew up on it. The story is wonderful, I've played through it so many times over the years. The characters are all so well developed and it's just a wonderful game overall!

Absolutely one of the best puzzle/adventure games out there. The story is deep, and leaves you craving more. The sad part is, we may never see another. Hands down worth a play through.

This game is the most rewarding and satisying one I ever played.  Its a clean puzzle game only. In fact like most games. There are a few places where you need speed and agility as well.  But its innocence, nostalgia, comedy catches your heart and does not let go. You feel like coming to tears because its finished and you cannot play  anymore.  Maybe its the frequencies they used for its music, but all the hard work they did on this one and the humane feeling it gives you truly bored and burned a hole in my heart.  And I am not a kid or a woman. I am a 55 year old engineer.  So its well worth the measly price and huge time you will enjoy inveting in it.  Wish they continue with new innovations on the Portal series.
